notes: Single uncle, rushed application due to siblings needing urgent care.
interviewResponses: They're family. I have to take them in.
I don't have much, but I have love and a roof.
backgroundCheckNotes: Minor debt, but no criminal activity.

interviewBranches.question: How will you manage with two children?
possibleResponses: I have family support and we'll stick together.
We'll take it one day at a time, as a family.

interviewBranches.question: What's your plan for their education?
possibleResponses: I'll work extra hours to afford good schools.
We'll use community resources and support programs.

interviewBranches.question: How will you help them heal from trauma?
possibleResponses: We'll get professional help and I'll be there every step.
Love, patience, and keeping them together will help.
